DOC.detailed_description: This study test new medication strategy design help smoker quit . It evaluate Baclofen , drug currently approve available Canada myorelaxant . Forty five nicotine-dependent smoker enroll study . Fifteen receive placebo ( inactive pill ) , fifteen receive baclofen 30 mg/day , fifteen receive baclofen 60 mg/day . Once enrol , subject visit CAMH weekly basis assessment smoke behaviour , brief health check ( vitals , BP AE screen ) , delivery brief individual smoking cessation counselling , collection breath , blood urine sample ( schedule ) ) measure level nicotine metabolite , b ) conduct pregnancy tox test . The medication phase study last 12 week . Two follow-up visit schedule week 13 six month trial completion .
